title: Enhancing Customer Service Practice Competencies: Improving STEM Learning Efficiency Through Spatial Ability Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic engineering concepts and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can spatially analyze engineering problems and apply visualization strategies using 3D modeling tools.
Achieve a 20% improvement in spatial ability test scores (visualization, directional sense) through training intervention activities.
In PBL projects, learners systematically integrate and manage technical information by applying spatial reasoning skills, maintaining a retention rate of 40% or higher two weeks after learning.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
